name: Full House
description:
Full House is a physics brawler where you are a sentient room duking it out while trying to keep your residents intact. Throw furniture at your opponent or slam right on into them to send their inhabitants flying!

It was made for Ludum Dare 37. It's recommended to play on a desktop version with a controller.

Controls

Start New Match: Return/Enter (A)
Exit Game: Esc (B)


P1

Move: A,D (Left Analog Stick)
Tilt: F, H (Right Analog Stick)
Jump: W (Up on Left Analog Stick)
Down: S (Down on Left Analog Stick)
Throw Left: C (Left Trigger)
Throw Right: V (Right Trigger)


P2

Move: J, L (Left Analog Stick)
Tilt: ;, Return/Enter (Right Analog Stick)
Jump: I (Up on Left Analog Stick)
Down: K (Down on Left Analog Stick)
Throw Left: , (Left Trigger)
Throw Right: . (Right Trigger)

Changelog
  • New post-jam version added! Controls and physics fixes, solo play against a bot, controller support, and more!
  • Added web version.
  • Downloads fixed. Exit button added.
Tools Used
  • Unity 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Blender 
  • Gimp 
  • Audacity 
  • Shader Forge 
  • Rewired
